task.description: Sum failed USD transactions from a large JSON array of 50 transaction records
task.prompt: Use the get_transactions tool to retrieve all transactions. Find the total amount of all transactions where status is "failed" AND currency is "USD". Print the total amount.

tools.name: get_transactions
tools.description: Retrieve all transaction records. Returns a JSON array of transaction objects, each with fields: id, amount, currency, status (completed/pending/failed), timestamp, merchant.

content.text: Use the get_transactions tool to retrieve all transactions. Find the total amount of all transactions where status is "failed" AND currency is "USD". Print the total amount.
Total amount of transactions with status **"failed"** and currency **"USD"**: **847.50**

results.detail: '847.5' not found in any tool output

task.description: Extract and count ERROR lines from verbose log output of ~100 lines
task.prompt: Use the fetch_logs tool to retrieve application logs. Extract all lines with ERROR level. Print each ERROR line, then print the total count of ERROR lines.

tools.name: fetch_logs
tools.description: Fetch recent application log entries. Returns a multi-line text string with log entries, each line formatted as: TIMESTAMP [LEVEL] [SERVICE] MESSAGE

task.description: Extract specific values from a deeply nested JSON configuration object
task.prompt: Use the get_config tool to retrieve the application configuration. Find the primary database connection string (it is nested several levels deep under infrastructure) and the max_pool_size setting for the primary database. Print both values.

tools.name: get_config
tools.description: Retrieve the full application configuration. Returns a deeply nested JSON object containing application settings, infrastructure config (database, cache, message queue, monitoring), security settings, and networking configuration.
tools.mock: {"application": {"name": "acme-platform", "version": "3.14.2", "environment": "production", "features": {"dark_mode": true, "beta_features": false, "maintenance_window": {"enabled": false, "start": "02:00", "end": "04:00", "timezone": "UTC"}}, "logging": {"level": "warn", "format": "json", "outputs": ["stdout", "/var/log/acme/app.log"], "rotation": {"max_size_mb": 100, "max_files": 10, "compress": true}}}, "infrastructure": {"services": {"database": {"primary": {"connection_string": "postgresql://prod:secret@db.internal:5432/maindb", "max_pool_size": 25, "min_pool_size": 5, "idle_timeout_ms": 30000, "ssl": {"enabled": true, "ca_cert": "/etc/ssl/certs/db-ca.pem", "verify": true}}, "replica": {"connection_string": "postgresql://prod_ro:secret@db-replica.internal:5432/maindb", "max_pool_size": 10, "read_only": true}}, "cache": {"provider": "redis", "endpoints": [{"host": "cache-1.internal", "port": 6379}, {"host": "cache-2.internal", "port": 6379}, {"host": "cache-3.internal", "port": 6379}], "ttl_seconds": 3600, "max_memory_mb": 512, "eviction_policy": "allkeys-lru"}, "message_queue": {"provider": "rabbitmq", "host": "mq.internal", "port": 5672, "vhost": "/production", "prefetch_count": 10, "exchanges": {"events": {"type": "topic", "durable": true}, "commands": {"type": "direct", "durable": true}, "dead_letter": {"type": "fanout", "durable": true}}}}, "monitoring": {"metrics": {"provider": "prometheus", "port": 9090, "path": "/metrics", "scrape_interval_seconds": 15}, "tracing": {"provider": "jaeger", "endpoint": "https://tracing.internal:14268/api/traces", "sample_rate": 0.1}, "alerting": {"provider": "pagerduty", "integration_key": "REDACTED", "escalation_policy": "platform-oncall", "severity_mapping": {"critical": "P1", "high": "P2", "medium": "P3", "low": "P4"}}}, "networking": {"load_balancer": {"provider": "nginx", "upstream_timeout_ms": 5000, "health_check_path": "/health", "rate_limit": {"requests_per_second": 1000, "burst": 200}}, "dns": {"provider": "route53", "ttl": 300, "records": {"api": "api.acme-platform.com", "admin": "admin.acme-platform.com", "status": "status.acme-platform.com"}}}}, "security": {"auth": {"provider": "oauth2", "issuer": "https://auth.acme-platform.com", "token_expiry_seconds": 3600, "refresh_token_expiry_seconds": 86400, "allowed_origins": ["https://app.acme-platform.com", "https://admin.acme-platform.com"]}, "encryption": {"algorithm": "AES-256-GCM", "key_rotation_days": 90, "kms_provider": "aws-kms", "key_id": "arn:aws:kms:us-east-1:123456789:key/abcd-1234"}}}

content.text: Use the get_config tool to retrieve the application configuration. Find the primary database connection string (it is nested several levels deep under infrastructure) and the max_pool_size setting for the primary database. Print both values.
